A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I actually signed up for a RT account just to shit on this movie. 

Being a life long Star Wars fan I couldn't believe my senses. This is hands-down the worst Star Wars movie ever made and it really just craps on and erases all of the other movie premises and characters. 

Rian Johnson is an immeasurable asshole who should be ashamed of himself. There was nothing new or daring about this mess of a "script" or movie. It was just a lazy shit-on-everything that WAS Star Wars festival. He must hate the other movies and George Lucas.
